entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

Observed at: Baccaro Point 7:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

Humidity: 100 %

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
